sqlMap.select: SELECT bd_no, bd_title, bd_content, bd_wdt, bd_hit, bd_like, b.nick, pic_path FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, v1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_board ORDER BY bd_no DESC ) v1 WHERE rownum <= #end# ) v2 WHERE v2.rnum >= #start# ) b, t_user u WHERE b.user_no = u.user_no AND b.gb_del = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM t_board WHERE gb_del = 'N'
